TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LinqDataSourceDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner

summary.span: 在可视化设计器中为 控件提供设计时支持。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在可视化设计器中，当你切换到设计器视图 (如**设计**Visual Studio 中的视图])，则控件标记进行分析。In a visual designer, when you switch to a designer view (such as **Design** view in Visual Studio]), the control markup is parsed. 在设计图面上然后创建该控件的设计时版本。A design-time version of the control is then created on the design surface. 当你切换到源视图时，则设计时控件仍保持为 Web 页的标记。When you switch to source view, the design-time control is persisted as the markup for the Web page. 类提供设计时支持可视设计器中的控件。The class provides design-time support for the control in a visual designer.

para.span: 若要在设计时操作列表菜单提供派生类中的命令，必须重写属性。

span.span: To provide commands in a derived class for the action list menu at design time, you must override the property.

para.span: 此属性返回一个自定义包含派生自的项的对象对象。

span.span: For this property, return a custom object that contains items that derive from the object.

para.span: 有关更多信息，请参见 类。

span.span: For more information, see the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property ActionLists As DesignerActionListCollection

summary.span: 获取项的列表，其中的项用来在设计时创建操作列表菜单。

span.span: Gets a list of items that are used to create an action list menu at design time.

value.span: 包含操作列表项的集合。

span.span: A collection that contains the action list items.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property CanConfigure As Boolean
public: virtual property bool CanConfigure { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 方法是否可被设计宿主调用。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the method can be called by the design host.

value.span: 如果可以调用 方法，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the method can be called; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以调用方法，如果属性关联的控件实现接口。The method can be called if the property of the associated control implements the interface. 在这种情况下，属性值是`true`。In that case, the property value is `true`. 如果属性是`true`、**配置数据源**菜单项显示在**LinqDataSource 任务**可视化设计器图面上的关联控件的菜单。If the property is `true`, the **Configure Data Source** menu item is displayed in the **LinqDataSource Tasks** menu of the associated control on the visual designer surface. 选择此项目时，**配置数据源**启动向导。When this item is selected, the **Configure Data Source** wizard is started.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property CanRefreshSchema As Boolean
public: virtual property bool CanRefreshSchema { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 方法是否可被设计宿主调用。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the method can be called by the design host.

value.span: 如果可以调用 方法，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the method can be called; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以调用方法，如果满足所有以下条件：The method can be called if all the following conditions are true: - 属性关联的控件实现接口。The property of the associated control implements the interface. - 属性包含的值。The property contains a value. 如果这些条件为 true，属性值是`true`。If these conditions are true, the property value is `true`. 如果是`true`、**刷新架构**菜单项显示在**LinqDataSource 任务**可视化设计器图面上的关联控件的菜单。If the is `true`, the **Refresh Schema** menu item is displayed in the **LinqDataSource Tasks** menu of the associated control on the visual designer surface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Configure() cil managed

summary.span: 在设计宿主中启动数据源配置向导。

span.span: Launches the data source configuration wizard in the design host.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法启动**配置数据源**向导在可视化设计器图面上。The method starts the **Configure Data Source** wizard on the visual designer surface. 方法调用时**配置数据源**菜单项上选择**LinqDataSource 任务**菜单关联的控件。The method is called when the **Configure Data Source** menu item is selected on the **LinqDataSource Tasks** menu of the associated control. **配置数据源**菜单项显示在**LinqDataSource 任务**菜单时属性是`true`。The **Configure Data Source** menu item appears on the **LinqDataSource Tasks** menu when the property is `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ContextTypeName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置包含属性（其值包含要检索的数据）的类型的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the type that contains the property whose value has the data that you want to retrieve.

value.span: 要从中检索数据的类的名称。

span.span: The name of the class to retrieve data from.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Delete { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置删除操作的一个值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value for the delete operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在实例，设置此属性不起作用。In a instance, setting this property has no effect. 此属性隐藏关联控件中的属性，旨在仅供内部使用。This property shadows a property in the associated control, and is intended for internal use only.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableDelete { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可以在运行时从数据源中删除行。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether rows can be deleted from the data source at run time.

value.span: 如果为关联的 实例的用户启用了删除操作，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the delete operation is enabled for users of the associated instance; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableInsert { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可以在运行时向数据源中插入行。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether rows can be inserted into the data source at run time.

value.span: 如果为关联的 实例的用户启用了插入操作，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the insert operation is enabled for users of the associated instance; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableUpdate { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可以在运行时更新数据源中的行。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether rows in the data source can be updated at run time.

value.span: 如果为关联的 实例的用户启用了更新操作，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the update operation is enabled for users of the associated instance; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void RefreshSchema(bool preferSilent) cil managed

param.name: preferSilent
param.span: 表示取消所有数据源事件，直到刷新架构为止。

span.span: to suppress all data source events until the schema is refreshed.

summary.span: 从基础数据源刷新架构。

span.span: Refreshes the schema from the underlying data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在设计主机调用方法才是`true`。The design host calls the method only if is `true`.
